markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects with this trait deal acid damage. Creatures with this trait have a magical connection to acid.
name: Acid
